intro: Malanea jauaensis, commonly known as the Jauaensis Malanea, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Malvaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its large, showy flowers that typically bloom in shades of pink or white. It thrives in humid, warm climates and is often found in forest understories. Its botanical features make it an interesting subject for ecological and horticultural study.
